root.title: K mart KM februari sale UP 8.2 pct
root.body: K mart corp say februari sale rise 13.1 pct year ago compar store sale four-week period end februari 25 rise 8.2 pct K mart say consolid sale period 1.46 billion dlr compar 1.29 billion last year It say year-ago figur exclud sale discontinu oper K mart cite `` favor consum respons merchandis program say specialti retail excel februari sale
